decision_conditions: The timber framed windows and door on the rear elevation as shown on approved drawings in condition 3 shall be installed to the Council's satisfaction within six (6) months of the grant of this application, otherwise the planning permission will lapse.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.
| The remainder of the development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three (3) years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings / document title number(s): LOCATION PLAN; A-XX-011-00-01 (SITE LOCATION PLAN); A-XX-031-00-01 REV 01 (GROUND FLOOR PLAN); A-XX-064-00-01 REV 01 (SITE ELEVATION); S1038/1 REV 01 (WINDOW SCHEDULE 1); S1038/2 REV 01 (WINDOW SCHEDULE 2); S1038/3 REV 01 (WINDOW SCHEDULE 3); S1038/4 REV 01 (WINDOW SCHEDULE 4); S1038/5 REV 01 (PICTURE 1); S1038/6 REV 01 (PICTURE 2); WICKES TIMBER GATE (PRODUCT CODE 225238); EMAIL FROM APPLICANT TO CASE OFFICER DATED 12/06/2024

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).

| Any planting that is part of the approved scheme that within a period of five years after planting is removed, dies or becomes seriously damaged or diseased, shall be replaced in the next planting season and all planting shall be replaced with others of a similar size and species and in the same position, unless the Local Planning Authority first gives written consent to any variation.

Reason: To improve the visual amenity of the property through urban greening in accordance with policies 5.10 and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies D8, G4 and G5 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
description: Replacement of the front entrance door; replacement of rear door and windows; installation of fence and gate to east, north and west elevation
